content.detailedDescription: At approximately 1:30 am on january 25, 2014 i was getting into bed and noticed a very bright shining/flickering light in the south-east sky in salem oregon. at first i thought it was an aircraft, but the light emanating from the object didn���t flash in any recognizable pattern as one would expect from an airplane; my next thought was that it was a satellite because the flashes it was emitting were full spectrum, it seemed to be emanating all the colors one might expect to see in a rainbow, but this is where it started getting weird, the object started moving in a back and forth pattern rapidly for a few moments, then it would remain in place for a few minutes, then it started to wander lazily in random directions, moving in a westerly direction over the span of about one-and-a-half hours before it disappeared from view. i reported the lights to a neighbor who also confirmed the lights and the same movement patterns i described. we could not discern any shape, we could only see the flashing/flickering lights; we both described the light as brilliant, agreeing it was far too bright to be a star or a satellite.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant colorful flashing lights moving in a very unconventional way @ 1:30am on january 25, 2014 in salem oregon.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to pick up dinner at a pizza place on greenway & reems in surprise. traveling north on rems i noticed 2 stationary dark objects to the ne of my location. 3 to 4 more objects appeared and i first thought these might be the f-35's heading to luke afb in glendale or helicopters. i decided to head ne and noticed that now there were 3 objects, 2 high and 1 just above the mountain tops, the others vanished and there were only 3 in the sky. i grabbed my phone while i was talking to a friend and took some pictures and a video when i parked at the 142nd ave and statler (surprise city hall). the main objects remained pretty much stationary but one object to the left of the main 2 was quite low to the ground and was faint to see at times. i left the area after 8 minutes and they were still there. i left the area to pick up my food and when i left at 545pm the objects were gone from my view. i continued to check the whole sky on my way home and there was no sign of anything. the pictures and video were taken with an htc one x. resolution is 3264 x 1840.
content.summary: I saw 2 objects in the ne sky then 3 to 4 more appeared.

content.detailedDescription: While going out into my deck to have a cigarette i observed what appeared to me as some kind of balloon .... it was a windy day i remember blowing 15-20knts sw ... my deck faces south... it seemed to drift away at first.. what i though was odd is that the object returned into my view and looked like it was remote controlled ... hovering and moving against the wind... i would say the object was approx  500-1000 feet away.... i have photos i will try to download to whom ever is interested... maybe it's just some kind of remote controlled metallic looking ballon contraption ....
content.summary: While on deck observed strange object in sky.. wind sw 15-20kts .. object would seem to fly off the return against the wind... have photos...

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Approximately 9:25 pm january 24th 2014 i observed  2 reddish orange lights in the sky that moved in an ascending patter moving from south to north.  after approximately 2 minutes, new lights appeared to be "launching" or rising rapidly from the south and travelling to the north.  after reaching various altitudes, the lights would stop hover change direction and then eventually fade out and disappear at various intervals.  this occurred approximately 20 -25 times.  there was no sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 20-25 lights from launch and flight patterns to fade out and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, this is my 2nd attempt at submitting this event. i accidentally hit the back button on my phone earlier.
on the 4th of july, 2012 at approx. 7pm my husband & i were out back barbecuing & watching the neighborhood fireworks. i looked up and said, " honey, did someone set off a flare?" he said, "go get your camera now!" that startled me because he is a sceptical person & was in the navy & worked on helicopters. 
i got my phone & snapped as many pics as i could. (see attached) 
the " flare" zigzaged coming from the ne direction. went west, then straight to us, hovered over our treeline & creek approx. 100 ft up & 20ft away(see photo) it hovered for 2-3secs then zipped off in a blink of an eye towards the east over the huge powerlines behind us. there were fireworks going off all around it but it appeared brighter & more solid. it was a deep orange and vibrated like a trembling hand.
since then i've captured strange light anomalies in our rm. & have had strange dreams. one, i was on an island, speaking another language. i wa welcoming others. then, in a string-like beam of light i was sucked up into a craft. the table lookef like mercury and was very soft. the beings asked if i was ready like a whisper in my head, then i went thru my wall..& into bed. when i landed in bed i awoke before hitting..So..That was strange. i found the island i was welcoming others to & the language fits the area. aborigine. (see photo)
ty, for having a place to share. and sorry for me taking so long to.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flare that appeared to be remote control by an intelligent being

content.detailedDescription: Going downstairs to my room and a bright red crescent light with the curved edge facing downwards caught my eye off in the distance. it looked like a rising moon after a couple minutes it started to dim and go down into a forest about a kilometer away. roughly 3 hours before this event i saw a bright red light in the distance but had no distinct shape but was a lot brighter and smaller then the second "ufo" i witnessed. have been seeing a few unexplainable things in the sky the past few months but nothing quite as clear as this.
content.summary: Crescent with the curved edge downwards

content.detailedDescription:
A l���������������poque lyc������enne, lors d une observation astronomique  par une fen������tre du rez de chaussez  d 'un immeuble j',aper������ue  un groupe de 3 ���������������toiles de m������me taille (m������me a l���������������il nu de taille  importante par rapport a celle qui les  entour������es}le ciel n '������tait pas couvert cette nuit la et leur lumi������res blanche ������t������ tr������s vive ! juste au dessous de groupe de 3 ������toiles blanches une autre lumi������re de m������me taille remonter {  au centre de ce triangle}  celle ci ������tait de couleur rouge- orange  et pulser a rythme r������gulier .Une foi au centre de ce triangle  il eu un'' d������voilement' alors c'est mat������rialiser pour une fraction de seconde'' le le triangle '' les trois lumi������res blanches se rassembl������rent  vers celle du centre  {rouge orange qui ne pulser plus a ce moment } pour ne former qu'une grosse  boule rouge oranger{aspect ressemblant a une g������ante rouge } il eut une fraction de seconde ou ce point unique semblait  tressauter et grossir  2 ou 3 fois !??? juste apr������s quoi il  disparu dans une ascension fulgurante inou������e.... 
lorsque j ai remarquer ce que je pensais ������tre un groupe de 3 ������toile ,je chercher a les identifier,comment se nomment elles... ? de quelle constellation font elles partie ?....Ensuite en voyant la boule rouge oranger remontant en son centre je fus vraiment perturb������e par ce que je voyais, toutes ces caract������ristiques ne ressemblait a rien sa trajectoire , la vitesse ,la fa������on de se mouvoir ,la couleur rouge orange ,ces pulsations ..Je n'eue pas plus le temps de m'interroger plus lorsque je per������us pour une faction de seconde a peine  les contours de ce que je pouvais maintenant appeler triangle'' mat������riellement parlant''son ascension hallucinante et sa disparaissions  me fis rester sans voix aujourd���������hui hui encore lorsque j ������voque ce souvenir je ressent  toujours ce m������me sentiment ce choc,  cette incompr������hension totale , de questionnement permanent,le besoin de savoir la nature de ce que j ai observer  ...             comme si cet ������v������nement avait eu lieu la veille son intensit������ en moi   est toujours rester intacte et.La multiplication de t������moignages d'observation de cet ������poque {vague en  belgique...}ainsi que l'ouverture d'esprit du public d'aujourd'hui { plus a m������me de croire a ces ph������nom������nes sans ridiculiser leur t������moins oculaires  } . mont motiv������e a vous signaler cet ������v������nement aujourd'hui et enfin en finir avec toutes ces ann������es de silence ,j���������������tais une adolescente  curieuse de tout aimant l astronomie ,mes parents ma famille, mon entourage et mes copines de lyc������e n���������������taient  malheureusement  pas du tout ouvert  a ce sujet.
  .La peur de moquerie permanente ,la peur d���������������tre ''prise pour une illumin������e''m'a contrainte a garder le silence.
jusqu��������������� aujourd'hui ....
content.summary: Observation astronomique a å“il nu par une fenãªtre,repã©rage 3 grosses ã©toiles de mãªme grosseur formant un triangle {d'abord  invisible} boule rouge orange ã©mettant une forte lumiã¨re pulsante remontante au centre du triangle assention fulgurante disp

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside to have a smoke. 6 or so very bright orange-ish objects "floating" from north to south in a pattern formation with one leader and maybe 2 others them a group of perhaps 3-4 in the rear. no wind according to my home weather station and it was very clear at 34 degrees f. 
  i quickly ran around to find a camcorder, then by the time i got back outside (maybe 30 sec - 1 min)most had gone behind the house next door. i managed to capture one that i tried to focus on. it then vanished as you can see in the video. i went round the back to see where the others had gone but they were nowhere in sight.
  i first noticed the objects because they were very bright and bigger than anything i normally see in the night sky. i saw the same thing on new year's eve but likened them to chinese lanterns.
  i first thought they could be airplanes but there was no sound and they seemed to float as opposed to fly, even though they were indeed traveling on a n-s course. no specific actions, just traveling and then disappearing (vanishing).
  my feelings are simply that i wish to identify what this was. no other feeling or emotions are obvious to me.
content.summary: 6 or so bright orange star-like lights from north to south disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on route 2 in fitchburg ma from dinner with friends, when flashing lights caught the corner of my eye. i immediately looked at the lights and couldn't believe what i had seen. there was an object 30-40ft above me off to the side of the highway, just above the tree line. it blended in completely with the dark background of the sky besides when the 8-12 pulsating lights underneath it went off. then you saw this disc like object, only seeing the bottom since the top was still perfectly blending in with the dark sky. the "beams", for lack of a better description, were not traveling to the ground but merely extending 5-10ft. i was traveling at a rate of 65mph and this object took about 30 seconds to pass me traveling in the opposite direction, so if i had to guess its rate of travel, i would say the object was moving about 20mph or slower. even at 30-50ft above me, and rock throwing distance, i couldn't hear anything as far as engine wise. i was literally scared for my life so i sped up. by far the most terrifying experience of my life.
content.summary: Pulsating ufo while driving home

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on hwy 199 north, headed towards grants pass oregon. i was approximately 3.0 miles from the city just south of the rogue community college entrance. i noticed a white light with a red light, to my left, on the other side of the hwy. my thinking was these were lights to a plane. as i came closer to the object i realized it appeared to be stationary (not moving). i pulled over the car and watched the object which was hovering in my estimate between hwy 199 and redwood ave. 

i had just come from my daughters basketball game, reached in the back seat for my camera which was a cannon rebel. as i reached for the camera the object then accelerated on a heading sw. it moved at a quick pace and was gone rather quickly. i was not able to take any photos. i clearly saw the triangle shape. i cant say the exact color of the object but it appeared from my vantage that it was dark in color. i did not see any other lights, nor did i hear any sounds.
content.summary: Triangle shape object, one white light on one point, two red lights on other points

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work, i thought i noticed an airplane or helicopter. as i got closer to it and drove past it i realized that it was a triangular craft with windows and humanoid entities inside of it. it had three red lights on each corner of the undercarriage and blue blinking light in the center. i was unable to stop since i did not want to be noticed by the craft and a car came up behind me. the beings appeared caucasion with light brown hair and had on grey uniforms. there were two of them and it looked like they were standing up behind each other.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I am a pilot and both myself and my wife have had ufo encounters.  i have had 3 encounters and my wife has had two.  two of my encounters were at close range and one of my wife's was at close range.  the events date back to the 1960s, 1980s, 1990s and 2 were in sonoma and napa counties and one was in plumas county in california.  one of my encounters was at night in johnson creek idaho.

i do not wish to go into a lenghty written discription of the events but would be willing to discuss them in person with an investigator.
content.summary: There were four different events at different locations.  spacecraft, lights involved

content.detailedDescription:
My sweetheart and i saw a bluish light travelling very quickly 2 nights prior to this experience:

we were sitting around the campfire.  a light coming from the west just over the trees caught the corner of my eye.  we immediately got up and ran to the beach within seconds as the site backed onto the beach.  there were others looking for creates in the water with their flashlights at the time.  the solid orange and red fluorescent light object moved above and across us on the beach at an altitude of about 100m.  

after about 20 seconds of it slowly moving, i started to chant "om" as i did in the kings chamber of the great pyramid of egypt.  it then made a right turn and then at the same rate of speed it ascended at a 45 degree angle and slowly moved and dimmed into the night sky.
content.summary: Silent gliding directional changing solid bright orange and red object low over beach

content.detailedDescription: Friday night sitting in my room dark on computer, out of nowhere entire bedroom turned white like a camera flash went off coming through window. nothing outside and no noises were heard as well.
content.summary: Quick bright white flash filled bedroom then gone

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 9:30 pm. i was alone at home, reading a book in my bedroom. my kids slept in their bedroom in the basement. the lights were all off, except my reading 

light on my headboard. 

i was focused on my book when i saw something from the corner of the eye. i immediately felt chills. looking, i saw that there was nothing. so i continued my reading 

for a few minutes until a flash of white light lighted my whole bedroom. then i saw three white spheres the size of a basketball floating in the air at the height of 

the ceiling. i felt terrified. the spheres move synchronously in spirals around the room. spheres of light emitted a hum. spheres illuminated the room. with a yank, 

the spheres have stopped moving and vanished.

my heart was beating too fast. i looked at my phone and it was 10:34 pm. reassured, i told myself that i had probably dreamed of this observation. 

i instinctively looked out the window. what i saw completely hurt me. there was a total of two beings standing, looking at me through my window. they were about 4 

feet tall, big heads, big slanted black eyes, no nose, only nostrils. they looked at me with a terrible stare. i could feel anger towards me. i was sweating cold 

water. i was terrified. suddently, they disappeared in a matter of seconds. i felt reassured for a second, until something cold grabbed my legs and my arms at the 

same time. i couldn't move, they were holding me tight. i could feel something cold inside my skull, as if someone was touching parts of my brain. it was a really scaring experience. a really uncomfortable feeling. everything went black and i passed out.

i woke up next morning at 09h52, with a terrible headache. something happened last night. i will never be the same again.
content.summary: Hovering orbs inside my bedroom and alien figures outside my window. possible abduction

content.detailedDescription: On my way to pick my daughter up from her job, traveling south on sugar street i witnessed a green shaft of light come down from the sky, i saw no craft only the light.  after picking up my daughter we traveled in the direction of the where the light went down.  we found nothing.  this is a first for me.  i am rattled like never before.
content.summary: Large beam of green light shot down from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Appearing not far to the left of the orion constellation - saw what i assumed to be a satellite, as it was moving at satellite speed. quickly noticed that it seemed too bright to be a satellite. thought airplane. but they typically have flashing lights, this was a constant brightness. it was moving vertically upwards. started to slow down, appeared to move in the opposite direction slightly, moved upwards again, and eventually just stopped, staying in place. kept an eye on it for 10 minutes, it didn't move again. observed it to be the brightest light in the sky at the time. came back outside an hour later and still saw it sitting there in the sky.
this was two nights ago. i have still seen it in the exact same spot every night since then.
content.summary: Moving light, then hovered

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9pm, my roommate and i were going outside on the deck to have a smoke, she stepped out of the door 2 or 3 seconds before me and started saying "what's that"?  "what is it"?  i stepped outside and looked up and there were approximately 20 to 30 orbs floating directly over our heads.  they were traveling from east to west.  each one had a purple and pink glow, with a white spot light on one side.  they were independently moving their spotlights. they made no noise and they appeared to be checking things out or looking for something. we stood there stunned. i watched them float about a block away, then they started disappearing.  we started talking about what we had just seen, when about 30 seconds to one minute had passed, and here came one more all by itself. then they were gone.  i was truly amazed at what i had just seen.  i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Floating colored orbs

content.detailedDescription: Same as above, sighting only lasted about 7 seconds! this object was not like anything i have ever seen!
content.summary: Car sized red object flying at a low altitude over 65th and may area, back of craft glowing a brighter color of red, very reflective

content.detailedDescription:
It is with some doubt in my mind that i write to you today about a ufo experience i had several years ago. my doubt is not about what i saw, it has more to do with whether or not you will want to hear what i have to say.
anyway, here's my story.

in 2006 i was living in illinois but, working in washington state as a plumber.
towards the end of june or july i had arranged to meet a longtime lady friend of mine in illinois and after which we would then fly to my home in england.
i left washington on new year's eve with the intention of driving back to illinois during christmas's itself and was well on my way when the following occurred.
traveling east i had passed the northern part of yellowstone then going south i went over the "bighorn mountain' and going through a crow indian reservation south of billings, north of the montana\wyoming border.
i was in the middle of nowhere. there were no lights visible, not even the loom of lights from a distant town, nothing.
i can remember looking at my watch, it was 6:30 pm.
it was then a light in the sky caught my eye.
light appeared in the windshield on the driver side of my vehicle about 2 inches down from the top of the windshield and it then traversed across to the driver side of my vehicle where it stopped about 2 inches down from the top and 2 inches in from the left.
i paid little attention to the light at first thinking that what i was seeing was just the jet engine of a plane and carried on my way.
it was around 6:45 pm when i glanced at my watch again and then at the object in the sky. it was at this point in time i realize something was not quite right.
knowing the typical speed of commercial jet is between 500 and 600 miles an hour, and the speed of an f-15 fighter, one of the fastest jets in the sky is mach 2.5 or approximately 1400 miles per hour.
using the slower airspeed of a commercial jet traveling at 600 miles per hour, in the 15 minutes since i first observed the object, the object should now be 150 miles away and at such a distance it would not be visible to me.
i then wondered if the object was a star in the sky but, looking up and around i discovered the sky was overcast and no stars were visible.
i then thought maybe this was a and in anomaly in the windshield of the truck or maybe some strange reflection of one of my dash lights in my glasses.
so, i pulled over, got out of the truck only to discover that with my glasses on or off the light was still visible.
i got back in my truck and carried on my way still wondering what this could be.
my next idea was maybe this was a helicopter with a search light but very quickly discounted that idea. helicopters with searchlights do flyover towns and cities but not out in the middle of nowhere besides, again there was no loom of a light visible.
my next idea was maybe this light was fixed to the top of the tower and then up in the distance i spotted three red lights that were on top of the tower..
the red lights were on my left as was the white light which was some distance ahead.
looking out across this vast expanse of open land i could clearly make out the silhouette of the ground rising and then leveling off forming what one might call plateau and it was upon this plateau that the tower with the three red lights sat.
i thought i'd figured it out as i passed the towel with the red lights but, the silhouette clearly showed the landmass dropping back down
i then reasoned if the white light was on a tower then such a tower would've been placed on top of the plateau and that the position of the light was such i was sure they don't build towers that high.
it was one hour and twenty minutes when the object moved.
the object went straight up and i have never seen anything move so fast from a standing start...
i couldn't believe what i had just observed
this was not a shooting star, or a meteorite and what happened approximately 15 minutes later confirmed that.
at 8:05 pm the object reappeared in the sky some distance ahead of me and travel downwards an approximate 45��� angle and went right back to the position in my windshield (2 inches from the top, 2 inches from the side) were is an been for a little over one hour and a half.
shortly afterwards as i entered a town i lost sight of the object due to the loom of the street lights and i never saw it again.

that's my story and it is one i haven't shared with too many people
i did try and tell my lady friend what i had seen when i got back to illinois but, she laughed it off saying "they were probably looking for you after all, you are an alien"

thank you.......... fred chapman
content.summary: Observesd light for 1 hour and 40 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was in bed around 12 to 2 am when i observed the 3 to 5 blue lights

i first noticed the objects when i rolled over in bed towards the bedroom window

the objects didn't look like any airplane i've seen

the objects were just sitting in the sky blinking and they were all blue in color

i was puzzled by the lights as i didn't know what they were.

i lost sight of the objects when i went back to bed
content.summary: 3 to 5 flashing/blinking blue lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: While at family camp observed an unusal rainbow took out my cell phone and took photo. after reviewing photo saw orb in photo looked up and saw orb and took a second photo
content.summary: Took photo of rainbow and observed orb in photo after reviewing

content.detailedDescription: at about 2:01 in the morning i woke up in my room and heard a humming out side and went quickly and quietly went out the front door to investigate. when i looked around saw three bright orange orbs enclosed together with a large circle. i saw a silhouette around the orbs. they were spinning counter clock wise. there was a stream of water going to the craft apparently it was sucking up water. being familiar with ufo phenomena i knew it was getting fuel.I then said "i wonder if theres anyone else around" thinking aloud. i then hear the voice of a female i looked around and saw a silhouette near a tree. she  message from a nearby zeta or grey to not be alarmed, i told her i that i was not and that i knew of others who had seen beings like her before. she asked me if i knew what her race was called i guessed and told her that i thought she was a grey or a zeta. she nodded and asked me to come closer. i walked closer to about 10feet of her, she walked a few steps closer and i saw what she looked like in the moon light i told her some of the things that i know and she seemed to be surprised about how much i knew and what i knew. she said that she could keep in touch with me and speak to me my mind. i asked her "how she can you do that" she replied and told me that my brain was wired differently than others she humans she had observed. she asked me why this was, imtold her i had adhd, then she proceded further by asking questions about my age, gender,(probably because i was wearing a hoodie with the hood up and my face was shadowed) my weight, my height and if i had a quote on quote"mate", i then asked her what she ment by mate. "a female that you are coupled with". i replied with "oh you mean a girlfriend, no i do not". "interesting, thats unusual for males your age that we have observed" she said. i know that and its only because i cant find any females that seem appealing to me that aren't already  coupled with another male i told her trying to say it so she would understand what i was saying. i then heard a buzz from the craft. she looked at it and turned back to me and said she must go, but if at any time i needed to contact her to just say her name. i asked her what it was, she told me it was (al-tar-a). she then turned towards the craft and held up a light device and flashed a pattern at the window where is saw two more occupants. she turned back to me said she was glad to have met someone so knowledge able of her kind in such a un visited place. she then told me because i was so knowledgeable that she would not block the memory from my mind. i asked her if her race were a clone race like some of the other greys that i had read about. she replied with no we are not and we do not serve any other species like the others do. then she pushed a button on her wrist device and i felt a pain in the back of my neck and then i blacked out. when i woke up i was in my bed. i looked out the my window to see her where she was standing before waving goodbye to me. i waved back. she then pushed another button on her wrist device and a beam of light shot from the craft directly to her when the beam shut off she was gone. i then said her name, she replied with what is it is something wrong? i said no, i just wanted to know how i was back in my bed. she told me they teleported me and that there should be no side affects from it. i then thanked her and told her i would talk to her soon. she then said goodbye, i replied goodbye. the craft then shot off southwest. i looked at the clock and it was 4:20 in the morning.I talk to altara the last day of every month. i ask her about her race and her home world and she asks me about mine, we have a conversation for about an hour then i goto bed. i have become much more knowledge able thanks to her
content.summary: Object came quickly from the northeast hovered over the water sucked some up then took off  south easterly

content.detailedDescription:
I was cleaning out my trashcan a bit before 9pm pst on a beautiful, clear night and noticed a wierd light flickering to the southwest over everett, wa perhaps, or over the puget sound. it hung out for about 45 minutes, slightly moving to the left then back to its previous location and then circling around very subtly. i thought it was my vision so i sat in an outdoor chair very still to see if it still moved around, which it did. it looked like a wand with three diamonds flickering in the night sky making beautiful colors of blue, green, and perhaps red erratically but mostly seemed to shimmer a brighter lumen than the brightest night stars.  i got a pair of low power bird binoculars which showed it as a blue orb, but then concluded that it must be the lens of the binoculars that was making that shape as i could see one and then two starlight objects moving within the orb, as it looked different without the binoculars. i tried taking photos but all my videos and photos were black except one. interestingly, everything in the photo is black except the one speck that appears to be the object at a particular point when it was glimmering. not a great photo for an iphone5. i invited my wife outside to see it as well. she remarked on the colors it was emitting.

i went inside, then, after 20 minutes or so, checked the night sky from a skylight inside my home and saw that it had moved and was now an 75 degree level west-nw, much higher in the sky and i could only see the bottom of it - didn't appear cylindrical anymore and could see the sides, just the flicker at the bottom end. after a few minutes, i got bored and went to bed.
content.summary: Linear diamond necklace with three jewels and light shards emitting from each end

content.detailedDescription:
1. parked on the side of road
2. the light beams, it was a full moon nite, and totally visible
3. a ufo
4. it just hovered, i watched it for 10 mins and went to town, where people standing on the corner of depot st were watching it travel up route 302
5i wanted to get out of my car and get under it
6  i left to go home, and watched with the group as it went up route 302 toward middletown n y
content.summary: While traveling on road to town, pulled over to observe spacecraft hovering in a field  at tree top height of about 50 ft.  silver metal color , with bowed out windows around the bottom of the dome, and ultra violet lights (6) beaming down to the ground,

content.detailedDescription:
It was 4:15 in the afternoon.  i had just drove under the colorado blvd overpass going east on hiway 7 towards brighton, co.  the day was sunny and the sky was a beautiful blue with little or no cloud cover.  i observed an airplane that was ascending after taking off from denver international airport.  it was one of the larger planes.  one minute it was ascending and the next a huge bronze colored round saucer, that had no windows, and a solid dome, appeared as if out of nowhere.  one minute it wasn't there and next it was.  it happened quickly but in that time i was witness to a near air collision with the plane.  if the pilot had not had good reflexes i would have been a witness to one of the worst air collisions ever witnessed by anyone. i screamed and pulled my car over. luckily the pilot missed the saucer by descending fast and hard in a downward direction. the saucer immediately  swerved and changed directions upward in a south west direction and was gone in seconds. the airplane ascended and proceeded in north west direction.  when i got home i called dia but there was no information about a near collision.  there was no other traffic on the hiway and i was the sole witness to this event.

this event has stayed with me and is as clear as if i had just witnessed it.
content.summary: Flying saucer three times larger than the airplane  it almost collided with

content.detailedDescription: About 1:20 am jan. 24 2014 i was in bed and heard a faint humming sound.  i thought it was my generator in the garage but the sound started to get louder...I started wondering if it was my furnace.  i didn't want to get up so i continued to lay there....No more than a min later the bedroom and great room  filled up with a bright white light...I could see tree branches being casted on my patio doors in my bedroom... so whatever it was had to have been very low and right above the tree line at an angle. i jumped out of bed thinking that something was going to crash into the house the light was so bright...It should have brighten up the other two houses on either side of me...( at this time i have not checked with the neighbors)...I ran through the house looking out windows and open the front door...I did not see anything or hear anything.  the noise and the light was gone that quick.  i don't know what it was but i know it was not a helicopter.
content.summary: I was in bed heard a humming noise a few mins later bedroom and great room filled with a white light.

content.detailedDescription: In sept last week , i think it's 26 sept. 2013 , approx 6:42 to 6:44 pm . i saw in sky and i vexed after saw that . its a still light who spread and made some noise , after few second it return in star size light . few second after the light fly in a line and it's across 60 to 120 degree angle in 1 or 2 second and diaper . no sound .
content.summary: Light spread , return in star point light and fly

content.detailedDescription: object was bright green in color with a white trail. it suddendly appeared as something falling from the sky, it hesitated, got brighter, then it went dark; this appeared in the sky, at the same level and degrees, as towers that are positioned on the mountain that's to the right of interstate i-90, that is also viewed while heading east. within 5 minutes after we observed the falling object, an aircraft seemed to fly towards the falling objects direction, from the se (as if they had also spotted something strange).
content.summary: Bright green and white object falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription: At one am on the morning of january 19th 2014 i was walking to my mother's mobile home which is around the corner and to the north of my mobile home (we live in a mobile home park) i noticed 3 bright flashing lights in the sky . as i watched it the 3 lights became 4 lights and they reminded me of those christmas chaser lights as they seemed to move around the object . i kept watching the object and it was just sitting there with the lights flashing but after about 30 minutes it just seemed to float away or disappear . i was not afraid just a little uneasy because my daughter and i had a similar sighting a few months ago . on that occasion i was again walking to my mother's and saw the same bright flashing lights and went and got my daughter and as we stood there watching the first object we noticed another one only it seemed to be closer and the light was brighter and it was to the east, the first one was south east. as we stood there watching, another object appeared from the east but it was farther away then the other two but it had the same flashing chasing lights . i sent in one of these on that sighting as well . when we saw the first objects we were a bit scared but not totally frightened as we have had several sightings here and on a cattle ranch i had worked on . my mother and i were on our way home one day when we saw a saucer shaped cloud sitting just over a pasture across the highway from where we live . we saw that twice and at first it looked just like flying saucer clouds but the second time we saw it we could see a bit of silver just outside the cloud .My mom did not want me to report them as she does not think we will be believed .When i saw the latest object on the 19th i stood in the street and watched it for about 30 minutes and then it just floated away or disappeared . i don't understand why we have had so many sightings. we are not on drugs nor do we drink and we are not delusional
content.summary: Looked up at the sky to the north west and saw a circular craft with flashing lights
